entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who will be interviewed and published in The Quibbler.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as the one who says her father is happy to publish Harry's interview.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who thinks people will take Harry seriously if he's published in The Quibbler.

entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita is mentioned as the one who laughs at the idea of publishing Harry's interview in The Quibbler.

entities.name: the quibbler
entities.description: The Quibbler is mentioned as a magazine that will publish Harry's interview.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a newspaper with a version of the Azkaban breakout story.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as the location of the breakout.

relationships.description: Hermione thinks that people will take Harry seriously if he's published in The Quibbler.
Rita doubts that people will take Harry seriously if he's published in The Quibbler.
